content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>City and County of Denver, Parks and Recreation / Office of the City Forester</origin>         <pubdate>20131023</pubdate>         <title>Tree Canopy Assessment 2013 - Cities</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>Metro Denver City boundary polygons with attributes for tree canopy cover, potential tree planting spaces, and land cover classification summaries.</abstract>       <purpose>Quantifies the distribution of current tree canopy cover, maps locations of potential tree planting sites, and assists with prioritizing tree planting to mitigate urban heat islands.</purpose>     </descript>     <status>       <update>None planned</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-105.303831</westbc>         <eastbc>-104.489076</eastbc>         <northbc>40.102295</northbc>         <southbc>39.453072</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>urban-heat-island</themekey>         <themekey>land-use</themekey>       </theme>       <theme>         <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Categories</themekt>         <themekey>environment</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Denver</placekey>         <placekey>Denver County</placekey>         <placekey>Colorado</placekey>         <placekey>USA</placekey>         <placekey>Denver-Metro-Area</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>ACCESS CONSTRAINTS:   None.   USE CONSTRAINTS: The City and County of Denver is not responsible and shall not be liable to the user for damages of any kind arising out of the use of data or information provided by the City and County of Denver, including the installation of the data or information, its use, or the results obtained from its use.   ANY DATA OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE City and County of Denver IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  Data or information provided by the City and County of Denver shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the City and County of Denver, its officials, officers and employees from any liability arising out of the use of the data/information provided.
